thread.section_title: MOO.COM Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MOO.COM | www.moo.com | 5 of 147
thread.title: Veronica

author: Veronica
title: Veronica
text:
I had an issue with some business cards I receivedâ€”my fault, as apparently I didn't pay attention to the instructions so I left the trim marks on the uploaded artwork. I got in touch to see if I could receive a refund or exchange my order for a new batch and they not only offered to reprint the cards at no extra charge without needing the other ones back, but they also offered to include next day delivery at no cost (I had paid for fast delivery in the original order, but still).
No questions asked, my query was resolved in less than half hour. This company really stays true to the "money back" policy they mention on the website: really refreshing to deal with such helpful, efficient and honest customer service. Will be using Moo again.
